Islamist insurgency in the Maghreb.Date: 11 April 2002 - present | (20 years, 2 months, 2 weeks and 3 days)
Islamist insurgency in the Maghreb.Status: Ongoing | Insurgency in Algeria spreads through the Maghreb and in the Sahel | US-led Operation Enduring Freedom - Trans Sahara initiated in 2007 | Islamists capture northern Mali in 2012, engaging in a civil war | Chaambi Operations and IS insurgency in Tunisia | IS captures territory in the Second Libyan Civil War, largely fought back by 2016
Islamist insurgency in the Maghreb: Part of the War on terror
